setPosition

void setPosition(double x,
                 double y,
                 boolean absolute)
                 throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                        MicroscopeException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the absolute or relative position of the microscope.

Parameters:
x - X-position of the stage.
y - Y-Position of the stage.
absolute - TRUE if x and y are absolute positions, FALSE if the positions are relative to the current position.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

setDeviceSettings

void setDeviceSettings(DeviceSettingDTO[] settings)
                       throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                              MicroscopeException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the given device properties to the given values. Same as calling setDeviceSetting for every element in the array, except that the microscope is locked during the whole procedure, thus either all or none of the settings is set.

Parameters:
settings - Array of structures containing device, property and value configurations.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException
